verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וַיַּאַסְפ֣וּ <S%H622><s%> and they gathered אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> unto him all the elders יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and all the men יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> and all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְהַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> with him and the priests וְהַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people לְמִקָּטֹ֣ן <S%H6996><s%> both small וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and great וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and he read בְאָזְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H241><s%> in their ears אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> all the words סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> of the book הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant הַנִּמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> which was found בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> stood הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הָ֨עַמּ֜וּד <S%H5982><s%> by a pillar וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> and made אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּרִ֣ית ׀ <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָלֶ֜כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk אַחַ֤ר <S%H310><s%> after יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלִשְׁמֹ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> and to keep מִצְוֹתָ֜יו <S%H4687><s%> his commandments וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵדְוֹתָ֤יו <S%H5715><s%> and his testimonies וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתָיו֙ <S%H2708><s%> and his statutes בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> with all [their] heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and all [their] soul לְהָקִ֗ים <S%H6965><s%> to perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> that הַכְּתֻבִ֖ים <S%H3789><s%> that were written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in this book הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> stood כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people בַּבְּרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> to the covenant

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חִלְקִיָּהוּ֩ <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <S%H3548><s%> and the priests הַמִּשְׁנֶה֮ <S%H4932><s%> of the second order וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <S%H8104><s%> and the keepers הַסַּף֒ <S%H5592><s%> of the door לְהוֹצִיא֙ <S%H3318><s%> to bring forth מֵהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> out of the temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכֵּלִ֗ים <S%H3627><s%> all the vessels הָֽעֲשׂוּיִם֙ <S%H6213><s%> that were made לַבַּ֣עַל <S%H1168><s%> for Baal וְלָֽאֲשֵׁרָ֔ה <S%H842><s%> and for the grove וּלְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and for all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> and for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וַֽיִּשְׂרְפֵ֞ם <S%H8313><s%> and he burned מִח֤וּץ <S%H2351><s%> them without לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem בְּשַׁדְמ֣וֹת <S%H7709><s%> in the fields קִדְר֔וֹן <S%H6939><s%> of Kidron וְנָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and carried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲפָרָ֖ם <S%H6083><s%> the ashes בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> of them unto Bethel

וְהִשְׁבִּ֣ית <S%H7673><s%> And he put down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּמָרִ֗ים <S%H3649><s%> the idolatrous priests אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom נָֽתְנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> had ordained מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> whom the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיְקַטֵּ֤ר <S%H6999><s%> to burn incense בַּבָּמוֹת֙ <S%H1116><s%> in the high places בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמְסִבֵּ֖י <S%H4524><s%> and in the places round about יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמְקַטְּרִ֣ים <S%H6999><s%> them also that burned incense לַבַּ֗עַל <S%H1168><s%> unto Baal לַשֶּׁ֤מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> to the sun וְלַיָּרֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H3394><s%> and to the moon וְלַמַּזָּל֔וֹת <S%H4208><s%> and to the planets וּלְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> and to all the host הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven

וַיֹּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> And he brought out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲשֵׁרָה֩ <S%H842><s%> the grove מִבֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִח֤וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the brook קִדְר֔וֹן <S%H6939><s%> Kidron וַיִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> and burned אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> בְּנַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> it at the brook קִדְר֖וֹן <S%H6939><s%> Kidron וַיָּ֣דֶק <S%H1854><s%> and stamped [it] small לְעָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> to powder וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֙ <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲפָרָ֔הּ <S%H6083><s%> the powder עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קֶ֖בֶר <S%H6913><s%> thereof upon the graves בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

וַיִּתֹּץ֙ <S%H5422><s%> And he brake down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> the houses הַקְּדֵשִׁ֔ים <S%H6945><s%> of the sodomites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> that [were] by the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הַנָּשִׁ֗ים <S%H802><s%> where the women אֹרְג֥וֹת <S%H707><s%> wove שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it בָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> hangings לָאֲשֵׁרָֽה׃ <S%H842><s%> for the grove

וַיָּבֵ֤א <S%H935><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> all the priests מֵעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> out of the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיְטַמֵּ֣א <S%H2930><s%> and defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּמ֗וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which קִטְּרוּ־ <S%H6999><s%> had burned incense שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> where the priests מִגֶּ֖בַע <S%H1387><s%> from Geba עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> to Beersheba וְנָתַ֞ץ <S%H5422><s%> and brake down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places הַשְּׁעָרִ֗ים <S%H8179><s%> of the gates אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which פֶּ֜תַח <S%H6607><s%> that [were] in the entering in שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> of Joshua שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the governor הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂמֹ֥אול <S%H8040><s%> left hand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> which [were] on a man's בְּשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> at the gate הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

אַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not יַֽעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> came not up כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <S%H3548><s%> Nevertheless the priests הַבָּמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> of the high places אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> to the altar יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but אָכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> but they did eat מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of the unleavened bread בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> their brethren

וְטִמֵּ֣א <S%H2930><s%> And he defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתֹּ֔פֶת <S%H8612><s%> Topheth אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּגֵ֣י <S%H1516><s%> which [is] in the valley [בְנֵי־ כ] (בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֑ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom ק) לְבִלְתִּ֗י <S%H1115><s%> no לְהַעֲבִ֨יר <S%H5674><s%> to pass through אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that no man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֧וֹ <S%H1121><s%> might make his son וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּתּ֛וֹ <S%H1323><s%> or his daughter בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire לַמֹּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4432><s%> to Molech

וַיַּשְׁבֵּ֣ת <S%H7673><s%> And he took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסּוּסִ֗ים <S%H5483><s%> the horses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתְנוּ֩ <S%H5414><s%> had given מַלְכֵ֨י <S%H4428><s%> that the kings יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> to the sun מִבֹּ֣א <S%H935><s%> at the entering in בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by לִשְׁכַּת֙ <S%H3957><s%> by the chamber נְתַן־ מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H5419><s%> of Nathanmelech הַסָּרִ֔יס <S%H5631><s%> the chamberlain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּפַּרְוָרִ֑ים <S%H6503><s%> which [was] in the suburbs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַרְכְּב֥וֹת <S%H4818><s%> the chariots הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun שָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> and burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire
